body:
Recent commit e9ee9eaf (#13989) fixed testing version ranges inside
patch when clauses.  Previously, it was necessary to write all revs
individually for packages with multiple length version numbers (2019
and 2019.1).

This fixes the build for the old 2017.* versions.

----------

Thanks to @adamjstewart for issue #8957.
Thanks to @scheibelp for patch #13989.

At this point, it's possible to write the version ranges sensibly,
and all of the old revs should build cleanly.
title: intel-tbb: fix and cleanup patch version ranges
